name: glitchtip
tagline: A self-hosted error monitoring platform for tracking crashes and performance
description: Glitchtip is a self-hosted alternative to Sentry for error monitoring and performance tracing. It supports multiple language SDKs, dashboards, and alerts, providing complete visibility into app errors and crashes.

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Track transaction performance and identify slow operations in your applications

features.title: REST API
features.description: Drop-in replacement for Sentry with compatible SDK and API

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Group similar errors, assign to team members, and track resolution status

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Set up notifications for new errors or performance degradation

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Keep all error data and user information on your own infrastructure
